Layout renderings

The Layout Renderings pane third to the top contains the renderings that the Sitecore Rendering Engine uses the generate the output.

When the SPEAK Fiddle generates the output, it transforms the contents of this pane into a Renderings field which Sitecore then renders.

It is possible to use either the names of renderings (as shown in this sample) or the raw Sitecore format.

If you use the name of a rendering, any attributes are added to the Parameters property of the rendering.

The special "Fiddle" rendering identifies the current component in this SPEAK Fiddle.
